title: Building the ultimate speaker requires ultimate engineering
text: Building the ultimate speaker requires ultimate engineering Saturday, 19 September 2015 (19 minutes ago) Ultimate Ears makes some of the most popular and highly rated Bluetooth speakers on the market, and there's a reason the company has been so successful: it outsources nothing. Watch how UE builds a Bluetooth speaker from the ground up on our video. You Might Like Other recent news in Technology Comments Twitter L.
